allow: Bash(timeout 90 bash -c 'while true; do status=$\(gh run list --limit 1 --json conclusion --jq "".[0].conclusion""\); if [[ ""$status"" == ""success"" ]] || [[ ""$status"" == ""failure"" ]]; then echo ""Status: $status""; gh run list --limit 1; break; fi; sleep 5; done')

Bash(timeout 60 bash -c 'while true; do status=$\(gh run list --workflow ""Deploy to Cloudflare Pages"" --limit 1 --json conclusion --jq "".[0].conclusion""\); if [[ ""$status"" == ""success"" ]] || [[ ""$status"" == ""failure"" ]]; then echo ""Cloudflare Status: $status""; gh run list --workflow ""Deploy to Cloudflare Pages"" --limit 1; break; fi; sleep 5; done')

Bash(timeout 90 bash -c 'while true; do status=$\(gh run list --workflow ""Deploy to Cloudflare Pages"" --limit 1 --json conclusion --jq "".[0].conclusion""\); if [[ ""$status"" == ""success"" ]] || [[ ""$status"" == ""failure"" ]]; then echo ""Deploy Status: $status""; gh run list --workflow ""Deploy to Cloudflare Pages"" --limit 1; break; fi; sleep 5; done')
Bash(powershell -Command "\(Get-Content index.ts\) | Where-Object { $_-notmatch ''Determinism \\\(dev-only'' -and $_-notmatch ''export \\* from.*determinism'' } | Set-Content index.ts")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(demo\): add public demo mode with onboarding and polish

Implements complete public demo mode infrastructure:

- Add VITE_PUBLIC_DEMO environment flag
- Gate all dev tools \(determinism panel, preview badges\)
- Create Start Here onboarding modal with examples
- Add keyboard shortcuts documentation in Help
- Implement canvas empty state messaging
- Add autosave recovery toast notifications
- Create About page/modal \(Cmd+/\)
- Polish copy for public-facing content

All features are production-ready. Set VITE_PUBLIC_DEMO=true for deployment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
